content:
• Expanded, state of the art fitness center
  • Morning beverage service including local Equator coffee and Mighty leaf tea
  • Super-Fast Wi-Fi – unlimited device connections
  • PressReader* digital magazines and newspapers
  • Public iMac Computers
  • Free printing and faxing
  • Tech Library Loans
  • Google Chromecast ready rooms
  • Vehicle charging station
  • Valet parking
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Concierge
  • Multilingual staff
  • ATM on site
  • Complimentary Local & domestic long distance calls
  • Laundry/dry cleaning
  • Eat & Drink at Seven Stills Nob Hill

 

A $25 nightly urban fee covers Stanford Court hotel’s extensive amenities. This fee is subject to San Francisco occupancy tax.
